Quote.Author: Nile Rodgers
Quote.QuoteValue: I wouldn't know how to retire

Quote.Author: Nina Arianda
Quote.QuoteValue: My favorite place to vacation is anyplace by the ocean

Quote.Author: Nina Arianda
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't have white roses. They symbolize death

Quote.Author: Nina Arianda
Quote.QuoteValue: I try not to put my purse on the floor - demons will get into it

Quote.Author: Nina Arianda
Quote.QuoteValue: I let steam off by watching 'Downton Abbey.'

Quote.Author: Nina Arianda
Quote.QuoteValue: If I'm having a bad day in rehearsal, I'll sleep with my script

Quote.Author: Nina Arianda
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had a very supportive mother my entire life, so I've had strong women around me

Quote.Author: Nina Arianda
Quote.QuoteValue: I never approach a character from a negative place

Quote.Author: Nina Arianda
Quote.QuoteValue: You leave part of yourself on every stage you're on. How could you not live in the air somehow?

Quote.Author: Nina Arianda
Quote.QuoteValue: I see something new in 'Gosford Park' every time I watch it

Quote.Author: Nina Arianda
Quote.QuoteValue: I love all things Queen - their songs are epic storytelling

Quote.Author: Nina Dobrev
Quote.QuoteValue: Even though you're growing up, you should never stop having fun

Quote.Author: Nina Dobrev
Quote.QuoteValue: I think you have to draw from any character and bring it to yourself as much as possible

Quote.Author: Nina Dobrev
Quote.QuoteValue: In my day-to-day life, I'm kind of a tomboy. I like being comfortable

Quote.Author: Nina Dobrev
Quote.QuoteValue: Over the holidays is when I have the most occasions to cook and bake

Quote.Author: Nina Dobrev
Quote.QuoteValue: I was kind of a jock in school. Beauty wasn't something I spent a lot of time on

Quote.Author: Nina Dobrev
Quote.QuoteValue: I mean everybody's got ex-boyfriends and girlfriends. Everybody's got baggage

Quote.Author: Nina Dobrev
Quote.QuoteValue: I've realized skinny isn't necessarily attractive. Guys like girls with curves

Quote.Author: Nina Dobrev
Quote.QuoteValue: I mean, I love to try and cook. I'm pretty good, but I'm not saying I'm great

Quote.Author: Nina Dobrev
Quote.QuoteValue: Actually... I'm starting a new thing and rebelling against ridiculously high heels. It's inhumane

Quote.Author: Nina Dobrev
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm kind of a globetrotter. I've been traveling since I was born and living in different locations

Quote.Author: Nina Easton
Quote.QuoteValue: Public anger over bank bailouts was as much about fairness as the billions of dollars spent

Quote.Author: Nina Easton
Quote.QuoteValue: Great leaders don't rush to blame. They instinctively look for solutions

Quote.Author: Nina Easton
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the danger with the liberal Left is seeing the Republican Party as a monolith

Quote.Author: Nina Easton
Quote.QuoteValue: In 1996, Bill Clinton declared the era of big government over in the State of the Union address

Quote.Author: Nina Easton
Quote.QuoteValue: The discovery of heroes is rarely linear or obvious. They usually sneak up on you

Quote.Author: Nina Easton
Quote.QuoteValue: Reality shows serve up juicy drama out of human shortcomings

Quote.Author: Nina Easton
Quote.QuoteValue: We like to think that a free market's greatest strength is its self-corrective nature

Quote.Author: Nina Easton
Quote.QuoteValue: We like to think of women as peacemakers, not purveyors of violence

Quote.Author: Nina Easton
Quote.QuoteValue: Presidential coverage used to be a very serious endeavor

Quote.Author: Nina Easton
Quote.QuoteValue: Main Street versus Wall Street was the 2008 economic mantra of Democrat Barack Obama

Quote.Author: Nina Garcia
Quote.QuoteValue: Serving jury duty is a fascinating little slice of life, with its motley crew of personalities

Quote.Author: Nina Garcia
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a big believer that accessories can make or break a look

Quote.Author: Nina Garcia
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing is more alluring to a man than a woman who looks good in her jeans

Quote.Author: Nina Garcia
Quote.QuoteValue: Putting on fierce boots is an instant pick-me-up

Quote.Author: Nina Garcia
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm all about the high heel; I think it's the sexiest accessory ever made, including lingerie

Quote.Author: Nina Garcia
Quote.QuoteValue: Your wardrobe should complement your skill set, never detract - or distract - from your assets

Quote.Author: Nina Garcia
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm really looking to reach any woman who's interested in refining and embracing her personal style

Quote.Author: Nina Garcia
Quote.QuoteValue: Fashion is an expression of a time, of a place, of history. It's putting things into context

Quote.Author: Nina Garcia
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been opinionated, unfortunately, to my mother's disappointment

Quote.Author: Nina Garcia
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always spoken my mind. There's no reason not to!

Quote.Author: Nina Hagen
Quote.QuoteValue: As long as karma exists, the world changes. There will always be karma to be taken care of

Quote.Author: Nina Hagen
Quote.QuoteValue: I was traveling on our tour bus through Europe and I was thinking I want to have long blonde hair

Quote.Author: Nina Hagen
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have to try to be outrageous. I am outrageous

Quote.Author: Nina Hagen
Quote.QuoteValue: I never have a bad night, bad day, bad moment

Quote.Author: Nina Hagen
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to see my show to believe that I'm the only unique Nina Hagen on this planet

Quote.Author: Nina Hagen
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a following. Whenever I am on tour they come. It is always sold out

Quote.Author: Nina Hagen
Quote.QuoteValue: I sing about heaven and hell, angels and demons

Quote.Author: Nina Hagen
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a human right to be able to have a relationship

Quote.Author: Nina Hagen
Quote.QuoteValue: I create my own lyrics. I have a great band. I have a drummer from East Berlin

Quote.Author: Nina Hagen
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is so great every day. I am telling things every day

Quote.Author: Nita Ambani
Quote.QuoteValue: Motherhood is the most challenging as well as the utmost satisfying vocation in this world

Quote.Author: Nita Ambani
Quote.QuoteValue: The lotus comes from the murkiest water but grows into the purest thing

Quote.Author: Nita Ambani
Quote.QuoteValue: I am too much of a team member to be separated from my team

Quote.Author: Nita Ambani
Quote.QuoteValue: As human beings, what we can do is extend help in whatever way possible

Quote.Author: Nita Ambani
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe primary and secondary education is the bedrock of any sustainable society

Quote.Author: Nita Ambani
Quote.QuoteValue: India is now changing and regaining its lustre, and it is coming of age

Quote.Author: Nita Ambani
Quote.QuoteValue: Every child has a right to education as much as to life, and every woman the right to live

Quote.Author: Nita Ambani
Quote.QuoteValue: Preventing female infanticide is equally important in protection of women's rights

Quote.Author: Nita Ambani
Quote.QuoteValue: Education is all about igniting young minds and enabling them to attain their fullest potential

Quote.Author: Nita Ambani
Quote.QuoteValue: Mukesh calls me his true life partner... I just enjoy being Mukesh's wife

Quote.Author: Noah Baumbach
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was a kid, I would fantasize about my own funeral

Quote.Author: Noah Baumbach
Quote.QuoteValue: I think anxiety is dangerous, but it makes you think it's your friend

Quote.Author: Noah Baumbach
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of black-and-white films generally have a color version that will be used for TV

Quote.Author: Noah Baumbach
Quote.QuoteValue: I love black-and-white movies that are about contemporary subjects

Quote.Author: Noah Baumbach
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always liked working with friends or, you know, people I have outside relationships with

Quote.Author: Noah Baumbach
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had times in my life when I really haven't been able to figure myself out

Quote.Author: Noah Baumbach
Quote.QuoteValue: Will Ferrell's made a lot of brilliant movies

Quote.Author: Noah Baumbach
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm interested in music as an extension of character

Quote.Author: Noah Baumbach
Quote.QuoteValue: Manhattan is so tailored. It's driven by appealing to the very wealthy and tourists

Quote.Author: Noah Baumbach
Quote.QuoteValue: Truffaut loved Hitchcock

Quote.Author: Nobu Matsuhisa
Quote.QuoteValue: Making sushi is an art, and experience is everything

Quote.Author: Nobu Matsuhisa
Quote.QuoteValue: The fine art of preparing sushi is something that you watch and learn

Quote.Author: Nobu Matsuhisa
Quote.QuoteValue: Chefs are artists, and I couldn't be happy with my art if I was forced to use cheap ingredients

Quote.Author: Nobu Matsuhisa
Quote.QuoteValue: A sushi chef has to spot the best-quality fresh fish instantly

Quote.Author: Nobu Matsuhisa
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not perfect. I am not Iron Man

Quote.Author: Nobu Matsuhisa
Quote.QuoteValue: Many chefs are either technically or artistically better than me, but I know my food has soul

Quote.Author: Nobu Matsuhisa
Quote.QuoteValue: Peru was the Incas; it has 3,000 to 4,000 years of history

Quote.Author: Nobu Matsuhisa
Quote.QuoteValue: A different spice is the most interesting thing to me

Quote.Author: Nobu Matsuhisa
Quote.QuoteValue: In Tokyo, we have more three-star Michelin restaurants than Paris

Quote.Author: Nobu Matsuhisa
Quote.QuoteValue: My cooking is simply ingredients plus umami

Quote.Author: Noel Coward
Quote.QuoteValue: If you must have motivation, think of your paycheck on Friday

Quote.Author: Noel Coward
Quote.QuoteValue: It's discouraging to think how many people are shocked by honesty and how few by deceit

Quote.Author: Noel Coward
Quote.QuoteValue: Work is much more fun than fun

Quote.Author: Noel Coward
Quote.QuoteValue: It is discouraging how many people are shocked by honesty and how few by deceit

Quote.Author: Noel Coward
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a heavy drinker, I can sometimes go for hours without touching a drop

Quote.Author: Noel Coward
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll go through life either first class or third, but never in second

Quote.Author: Noel Coward
Quote.QuoteValue: Wit ought to be a glorious treat like caviar; never spread it about like marmalade

Quote.Author: Noel Coward
Quote.QuoteValue: I've sometimes thought of marrying - and then I've thought again

Quote.Author: Noel Coward
Quote.QuoteValue: Never mind, dear, we're all made the same, though some more than others

Quote.Author: Noel Gallagher
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not interested in making money. It's just that with my talent, I'm cursed with it

Quote.Author: Noel Gallagher
Quote.QuoteValue: I have 3 kids and a cat and a busy, noisy house. I get more time to relax when I'm working

Quote.Author: Noel Gallagher
Quote.QuoteValue: There's not enough good things in the world

Quote.Author: Noel Gallagher
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't afford to think about what might have been. You just be aware of what is

Quote.Author: Noel Gallagher
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a little bit of a control freak when it comes to my music, unfortunately

Quote.Author: Noel Gallagher
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't be a mod and a rocker. You have to choose sides

Quote.Author: Noel Gallagher
Quote.QuoteValue: Kids and family life are only as good as your wife, and she's amazing

Quote.Author: Noel Gallagher
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm against people downloading music

Quote.Author: Noel Gallagher
Quote.QuoteValue: If I were in the Beatles, I'd be a good George Harrison

Quote.Author: Noel Gallagher
Quote.QuoteValue: We're not arrogant, we just believe we're the best band in the world

Quote.Author: Nolan Bushnell
Quote.QuoteValue: I just want the future to happen faster. I can't imagine the future without robots

Quote.Author: Nolan Bushnell
Quote.QuoteValue: The ultimate inspiration is the deadline

Quote.Author: Nolan Bushnell
Quote.QuoteValue: The truly creative people tend to be outliers

Quote.Author: Nolan Bushnell
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the only one who was predicting the Nintendo Wii would beat Sony's PlayStation 3

Quote.Author: Nolan Bushnell
Quote.QuoteValue: I try to get a vision of the future, and then I try to figure out where the discontinuities are

Quote.Author: Nolan Bushnell
Quote.QuoteValue: People like secrets. Creative people really like secrets

Quote.Author: Nolan Bushnell
Quote.QuoteValue: Hire for passion and intensity; there is training for everything else

Quote.Author: Nolan Bushnell
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't feel 70. I am still looking out from 14-year-old eyes

Quote.Author: Nolan Bushnell
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Grand Theft Auto', in its deification of antisocial behavior, is where I heap the most of my scorn

Quote.Author: Nolan Bushnell
Quote.QuoteValue: All schools will end up using game metrics in the future

Quote.Author: Nora Ephron
Quote.QuoteValue: If pregnancy were a book they would cut the last two chapters

Quote.Author: Nora Ephron
Quote.QuoteValue: I just bring a black turtleneck sweater everywhere - it's the greatest purchase of my life. Period

Quote.Author: Nora Ephron
Quote.QuoteValue: The neck starts to go at 43, and that's that

Quote.Author: Nora Ephron
Quote.QuoteValue: Summer bachelors, like summer breezes, are never as cool as they pretend to be

Quote.Author: Nora Ephron
Quote.QuoteValue: In my sex fantasy, nobody ever loves me for my mind

Quote.Author: Nora Ephron
Quote.QuoteValue: As far as the men who are running for president are concerned, they aren't even people I would date

Quote.Author: Nora Ephron
Quote.QuoteValue: Denial has been a way of life for me for many years. I actually believe in denial

Quote.Author: Nora Ephron
Quote.QuoteValue: I try to write parts for women that are as complicated and interesting as women actually are

Quote.Author: Nora Ephron
Quote.QuoteValue: Above all, be the heroine of your life, not the victim

Quote.Author: Nora Ephron
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything matches black, especially black

Quote.Author: Nora Roberts
Quote.QuoteValue: In the summer of '80, Silhouette bought my first book

Quote.Author: Nora Roberts
Quote.QuoteValue: I long for typical days, but rarely get them any more

Quote.Author: Nora Roberts
Quote.QuoteValue: One of my greatest pleasures is falling into a story someone else has written

Quote.Author: Nora Roberts
Quote.QuoteValue: If you write in category, you write knowing there's a framework, there are reader expectations

Quote.Author: Nora Roberts
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't find time to write. You make time. It's my job

Quote.Author: Nora Roberts
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't fiddle or edit or change while I'm going through that first draft

Quote.Author: Nora Roberts
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't base any character on a real person, and really don't do composites either. I make them up

Quote.Author: Nora Roberts
Quote.QuoteValue: The most important aspect of any story, to me, is character

Quote.Author: Nora Roberts
Quote.QuoteValue: And each book has to receive your best effort every single time. No slacking

Quote.Author: Nora Roberts
Quote.QuoteValue: I loved the process of writing

Quote.Author: Norah Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: Without a piano I don't know how to stand, don't know what to do with my hands

Quote.Author: Norah Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to be the next big anything. I just want to play for people and that's it

Quote.Author: Norah Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: A song will keep going round in my brain and keep me awake

Quote.Author: Norah Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: I wasn't a trained Mickey Mouse club performer. I played in jazz clubs and restaurants

Quote.Author: Norah Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: I make a good fried chicken

Quote.Author: Norah Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone in my high school was a bit nerdy. We didn't even have a football team

Quote.Author: Norah Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: Your limitations create your sound

Quote.Author: Norah Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: For me making music is part social, part interaction, part collaboration

Quote.Author: Norah Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: It's fun to peek into other people's worlds and see how they go about doing things

Quote.Author: Norah Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: A record is just a snapshot of where you are at any time

Quote.Author: Norm MacDonald
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not gay, so I don't know much about Broadway musicals

Quote.Author: Norm MacDonald
Quote.QuoteValue: I think clever people think that poor people are stupid

Quote.Author: Norm MacDonald
Quote.QuoteValue: I always told everybody the perfect joke would be where the setup and punch line were identical

Quote.Author: Norm MacDonald
Quote.QuoteValue: I love writing - it's the best. But I really hate collaboration

Quote.Author: Norm MacDonald
Quote.QuoteValue: I never do impressions, but I probably should. People like that stuff

Quote.Author: Norm MacDonald
Quote.QuoteValue: I never had any interest in sitcoms or motion pictures or anything like that

Quote.Author: Norm MacDonald
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't love your team without hating another team

Quote.Author: Norm MacDonald
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know anything about politics. I wouldn't put too much into my prediction on politics

Quote.Author: Norm MacDonald
Quote.QuoteValue: It got very tedious saying the same jokes in the same way with the same attitude

Quote.Author: Norm MacDonald
Quote.QuoteValue: I like doing a funny show where I don't have to act and fall in love with a girl

Quote.Author: Norma McCorvey
Quote.QuoteValue: The holocaust against the unborn is the greatest sin they could ever do or even ever participate in

Quote.Author: Norma McCorvey
Quote.QuoteValue: I was the Jane Roe of Roe vs. Wade, but Jane Roe has been laid to rest

Quote.Author: Norma McCorvey
Quote.QuoteValue: I really didn't know there was two sides to the abortion issue

Quote.Author: Norma McCorvey
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't attend any of the court proceedings

Quote.Author: Norma McCorvey
Quote.QuoteValue: I used the name Jane Roe because I didn't want my personal name to be involved in it

Quote.Author: Norma McCorvey
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a feminist writer, Naomi Wolfe, who is reconsidering her position on abortion

Quote.Author: Norma McCorvey
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not your body, it's not your choice, because you got that from God. He gave that to you

Quote.Author: Norma McCorvey
Quote.QuoteValue: I've got so much to do, I don't have time to sit down and be sad

Quote.Author: Norma McCorvey
Quote.QuoteValue: I am serving the Lord and helping women save babies

Quote.Author: Norma McCorvey
Quote.QuoteValue: If they don't care about me, how can they possibly care about anyone else?

Quote.Author: Norman Borlaug
Quote.QuoteValue: Man seems to insist on ignoring the lessons available from history

Quote.Author: Norman Borlaug
Quote.QuoteValue: Food is the moral right of all who are born into this world

Quote.Author: Norman Borlaug
Quote.QuoteValue: There are no miracles in agricultural production

Quote.Author: Norman Borlaug
Quote.QuoteValue: We will be guilty of criminal negligence, without extenuation, if we permit future famines

Quote.Author: Norman Borlaug
Quote.QuoteValue: If the world population continues to increase at the same rate, we will destroy the species

Quote.Author: Norman Borlaug
Quote.QuoteValue: Most people still fail to comprehend the magnitude and menace of the 'Population Monster.'

Quote.Author: Norman Borlaug
Quote.QuoteValue: It's amazing how often campaigners in rich countries think poor people don't get backache

Quote.Author: Norman Borlaug
Quote.QuoteValue: Roads are essential to any type of agricultural development

Quote.Author: Norman Borlaug
Quote.QuoteValue: Pricing water delivery closer to its real costs is a necessary step to improving use efficiency

Quote.Author: Norman Borlaug
Quote.QuoteValue: The lack of roads in Africa greatly hinders agriculture, education, and development

Quote.Author: Norman Cousins
Quote.QuoteValue: Death is not the greatest loss in life. The greatest loss is what dies inside us while we live

Quote.Author: Norman Cousins
Quote.QuoteValue: History is a vast early warning system

Quote.Author: Norman Cousins
Quote.QuoteValue: The eternal quest of the individual human being is to shatter his loneliness

Quote.Author: Norman Cousins
Quote.QuoteValue: Hearty laughter is a good way to jog internally without having to go outdoors

Quote.Author: Norman Cousins
Quote.QuoteValue: Your heaviest artillery will be your will to live. Keep that big gun going

Quote.Author: Norman Cousins
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is an adventure in forgiveness

Quote.Author: Norman Cousins
Quote.QuoteValue: A library is the delivery room for the birth of ideas, a place where history comes to life

Quote.Author: Norman Cousins
Quote.QuoteValue: Wisdom consists of the anticipation of consequences

Quote.Author: Norman Cousins
Quote.QuoteValue: Laughter is inner jogging

Quote.Author: Norman Cousins
Quote.QuoteValue: If something comes to life in others because of you, then you have made an approach to immortality

Quote.Author: Norman Davies
Quote.QuoteValue: The Black Sea is Eastern Europe's counterpart to the Mediterranean

Quote.Author: Norman Davies
Quote.QuoteValue: History must give the Poles the principal credit for bringing the Soviet bloc to its knees

Quote.Author: Norman Davies
Quote.QuoteValue: Poland is the natural bridge between East and West

Quote.Author: Norman Davies
Quote.QuoteValue: All states and nations, however great, bloom for a season and are replaced

Quote.Author: Norman Davies
Quote.QuoteValue: Winners of wars get a standing start in the post-war stakes of remembrance

Quote.Author: Norman Davies
Quote.QuoteValue: A bad historian is even more dangerous than dead documentary wood

Quote.Author: Norman Davies
Quote.QuoteValue: I find myself sick to death, tired of arguing about details with people who don't know basic facts

Quote.Author: Norman Davies
Quote.QuoteValue: The United Kingdom is not, and never has been, a nation state

Quote.Author: Norman Davies
Quote.QuoteValue: The one certainly for anyone in the path of an avalanche is this: standing still is not an option

Quote.Author: Norman Davies
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a real danger of the United Kingdom breaking up. There is a loss of common identity

Quote.Author: Norman Granz
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm talking as a professional impresario. I'm not judging anybody at all

Quote.Author: Norman Granz
Quote.QuoteValue: If you look at my audiences, even in Europe, they're hardly teenagers

Quote.Author: Norman Granz
Quote.QuoteValue: My juices needed restoring. I needed a sabbatical from the record business

Quote.Author: Norman Granz
Quote.QuoteValue: Sponsors and networks will really go all out and simply evaluate people on the basis of talent

Quote.Author: Norman Granz
Quote.QuoteValue: The public, hearing pop music, is, without knowing it, also soaking up jazz

Quote.Author: Norman Granz
Quote.QuoteValue: As long as we're in a democracy, I have to give what I think the majority of people will enjoy

Quote.Author: Norman Granz
Quote.QuoteValue: Ellington is a writer and arranger, as well as a musician and leader. He does movie sound tracks

Quote.Author: Norman Granz
Quote.QuoteValue: For years, Jazz At The Philharmonic albums were the only ones of their kind

Quote.Author: Norman Granz
Quote.QuoteValue: I allowed artists to play for as long as they felt they could justifiably continue to create

Quote.Author: Norman Granz
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know who's 18 years old today that, 20 years hence, is going to be a jazz fan

Quote.Author: Norman Jewison
Quote.QuoteValue: Betrayal... is my favorite subject

Quote.Author: Norman Jewison
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't make films to win prizes. I make films to make films

Quote.Author: Norman Jewison
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just a storyteller

Quote.Author: Norman Jewison
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm going to do an adaptation of the Italian film, Bread and Tulips. I really like that film

Quote.Author: Norman Jewison
Quote.QuoteValue: I work with a lot of movie stars

Quote.Author: Norman Jewison
Quote.QuoteValue: Do what you're told, and everything will be all right

Quote.Author: Norman Jewison
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm in the mood for another Moonstruck experience, for another romantic comedy

Quote.Author: Norman Jewison
Quote.QuoteValue: I was really excited to have the opportunity to make Fiddler

Quote.Author: Norman Jewison
Quote.QuoteValue: I think you get better as you get older

Quote.Author: Norman Jewison
Quote.QuoteValue: Moonstruck... was one of the few romantic comedies to be nominated for a Best Picture Oscar

Quote.Author: Norman Lloyd
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a conflict between what's in your mind and what's in your body

Quote.Author: Norman Lloyd
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a pure spirit, ha ha ha!

Quote.Author: Norman Lloyd
Quote.QuoteValue: Connie Bennett, the guys used to stake her, she was so good

Quote.Author: Norman Lloyd
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't eat shellfish. I drink wine moderately and have one whiskey every evening before dinner

Quote.Author: Norman Lloyd
Quote.QuoteValue: You must be active; you must be positive, even if things don't go the way you want them to

Quote.Author: Norman Lloyd
Quote.QuoteValue: I always felt it was necessary to keep up some kind of communication with other people

Quote.Author: Norman Lloyd
Quote.QuoteValue: I used to watch Babe Ruth for 50 cents. Now, baseball tickets are $400!

Quote.Author: Norman Lloyd
Quote.QuoteValue: Karl Malden! A dear, dear, dear friend. I loved Karl. He was great

Quote.Author: Norman Lloyd
Quote.QuoteValue: As far as 'St. Elsewhere' goes, I just loved that show

Quote.Author: Norman Lloyd
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very fond of Amy Schumer. I think she's terrific, an enormous talent

Quote.Author: Norman Mailer
Quote.QuoteValue: Hip is the sophistication of the wise primitive in a giant jungle

Quote.Author: Norman Mailer
Quote.QuoteValue: Sentimentality is the emotional promiscuity of those who have no sentiment

Quote.Author: Norman Mailer
Quote.QuoteValue: The function of socialism is to raise suffering to a higher level

Quote.Author: Norman Mailer
Quote.QuoteValue: Culture's worth huge, huge risks. Without culture we're all totalitarian beasts

Quote.Author: Norman Mailer
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not a good idea to put your wife into a novel; not your latest wife anyway

Quote.Author: Norman Mailer
Quote.QuoteValue: Tough guys don't dance. You had better believe it

Quote.Author: Norman Mailer
Quote.QuoteValue: Giving a camera to Diane Arbus is like putting a live grenade in the hands of a child

Quote.Author: Norman Mailer
Quote.QuoteValue: There is nothing safe about sex. There never will be

Quote.Author: Norman Mailer
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate everything which is not in myself

Quote.Author: Norman Mailer
Quote.QuoteValue: The Irish are the only men who know how to cry for the dirty polluted blood of all the world

Quote.Author: Norman Reedus
Quote.QuoteValue: The dogs with the loudest bark are the ones that are most afraid

Quote.Author: Norman Reedus
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm certainly honest - and I can be socially awkward

Quote.Author: Norman Reedus
Quote.QuoteValue: People are pretty strange

Quote.Author: Norman Reedus
Quote.QuoteValue: I used to hang out with a bunch of old punk rockers when I was a little kid

Quote.Author: Norman Reedus
Quote.QuoteValue: Damaged people gravitate towards damaged people

Quote.Author: Norman Reedus
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't not look cool with a crossbow

Quote.Author: Norman Reedus
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think anyone wants to cuddle a zombie

Quote.Author: Norman Reedus
Quote.QuoteValue: Oh, I love horror movies, yeah

Quote.Author: Norman Reedus
Quote.QuoteValue: If a woman is dishonest, that kills it for me. I can't even talk to her anymore

Quote.Author: Norman Reedus
Quote.QuoteValue: Peanut Butter Wolf is my relaxing music, my lunch music, my chilling music

Quote.Author: Norman Rockwell
Quote.QuoteValue: Some folks think I painted Lincoln from life, but I haven't been around that long. Not quite

Quote.Author: Norman Rockwell
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm the oldest antique in town

Quote.Author: Norman Rockwell
Quote.QuoteValue: Right from the beginning, I always strived to capture everything I saw as completely as possible

Quote.Author: Norman Rockwell
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll never have enough time to paint all the pictures I'd like to

Quote.Author: Norman Rockwell
Quote.QuoteValue: A face in the picture would bother me, so I'd rub it out with the turpentine and do it over

Quote.Author: Norman Rockwell
Quote.QuoteValue: Here in New England, the character is strong and unshakable

Quote.Author: Norman Rockwell
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not going to be caught around here for any fool celebration. To hell with birthdays!

Quote.Author: Norman Rockwell
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm tired, but proud

Quote.Author: Norman Rockwell
Quote.QuoteValue: You must first spend some time getting your model to relax. Then you'll get a natural expression

Quote.Author: Norman Rockwell
Quote.QuoteValue: It wouldn't be right for me to clown around when I'm painting a president
